## entries variable

A typesafe implementation of `Object.entries`

Taken from https://github.com/biggyspender/ts-entries/blob/master/src/ts-entries.ts

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
entries: <GType extends object, GKey extends Extract<keyof GType, string>, GValue extends GType[GKey], GEntry extends [GKey, GValue]>(obj: GType) => GEntry[]
```
